Class NamedValueCacheImpl

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamedValueCache

    public class NamedValueCacheImpl
extends Object
implements NamedValueCache
    The default implementation of the NamedValueCache used to cache NamedValue objects
